directions: Place the banana, yogurt, almond milk and protein powder into a blender and blend until smooth. Pour the mixture into a bowl and stir in the oats, then cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, preferably overnight.
When ready to eat, top with the nuts, blueberries and raspberries.
ingredients: A handful of pistachios or other nuts, blueberries and raspberries to serve
title: Banana and Blueberry Overnight Oats
